projects.title: Colorator
projects.description: A self-initiated project to build and design a colour palette builder and manager. I used React for the front-end, Laravel to create an API that manages users saved palettes and an external free API to fetch information on specific colours. The application allows a user to randomly generate a colour palette, along with numerous additional functionality to control customisation in order to quickly create and store their ideal palette. The colorator API is fully tested using Laravels testing capabilities.

projects.title: Collection App
projects.description: I Built a simple collection app that allows a user to maintain and show off their record collection. Created using OOP principles with vanilla PHP and a MySQL database, and without a framework in order to gain a deeper understanding of CRUD operations. This was an individual project with pull request reviews required upon the completion of each story and is fully unit tested.
